about_the_game:
Grimblestone is a point and click, FMV adventure game that sends you on a fantastical journey through the miniature and magical world world of Grimblestone.



A BIG adventure in a tiny world awaits -
When a mysterious artifact shrinks you down to the size of an acorn, you must journey through the miniature & magical world of Grimblestone. A mystical place full of puzzles, riddles, games and adventure, plus a whole host of Grimblings to befriend.

Explore the mysterious and tiny world of Grimblestone -
Hidden amongst the flowers, toadstools, tall grass and moss, just beneath the shade of the undergrowth; a hidden world is waiting to be discovered full of puzzles, mystery, music and more...



Meet the locals -
Grimblestone is a bustling little place, full of friendly Grimblings to meet. Some of which may just hold the key to help you find your way back home.

A puzzling adventure awaits -
Much more lies beneath the surface of Grimblestone. Help solve mysterious puzzles, musical mysteries and try your hand at cards with a Grimbling, to find the clues to return home.



A familiar, yet mysterious world -
Combining real world images, video, hand drawn illustrations and animation. Grimblestone's world is a mixed media collage of real life and fantasy, where there is always something new to see and experience.

The bottom of your garden may not seem far from home, but it's a very long way from Grimblestone.
